bio1: Braulio Calderon has a dedicated integrity to achieve his goals. One of his achievements is his Bachelor of Science in Computer Science from Lehman College, CUNY. Braulio started in computer science with no previous knowledge in programming.
bio2: The challenges that he encountered while working and getting his bachelor’s in computer science has made him  a better programmer and a faster learner. Computer Science was a career path that was intimidating on so many levels, but throughout his journey he has gained a level of confidence that continuous to motivate to push further into the field..
bio3: As a student, he was selected from a pool of eligible college applicants to participate in the Tech Talent Pipeline Residency. The program landed him his first internship in web development. The internship program consisted of an intensive tech bootcamp during a month of rigorous web development training.
bio4: Braulio’s skill to adapt to any condition has made him a person of endurance and perseverance.
